page.title: 20DOMESDAY DISK SCHOOLS
page.content: Two schools have participated in working on area 03480468, collecting information and writing for The Domesday Project. {CHRIST CHURCH C.of E.PRIMARY SCHOOL has been the co-ordinating school and {3rd. and 4th. year children}from their top class{(Class 6)}have worked with their Headmaster{Mr.Frank W. Kelly}and their class teacher{Mr.Derek Lion}in producing this disk. {NETHER KELLET COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL have joined them in this project, their{J1. and J2.}have worked with their class teacher{Mrs. Bundy}and{J3. {and J4.}with their Headmaster{Mr. D. {Mallinder.}They have also appreciated the assistance of parents and friends. Pages 1 to 10 were written by {Christ Church School}and pages 11 to 19 by{Nether Kellet School.}We hope they are interesting and informative.
